    • Method Detail

      • initTabs

        protected void initTabs(CodeStyleSettings settings)
        Description copied from class: TabbedLanguageCodeStylePanel
        Initializes all standard tabs: "Tabs and Indents", "Spaces", "Blank Lines" and "Wrapping and Braces" if relevant. For "Tabs and Indents" LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider must instantiate its own indent options, for other standard tabs it must return false in usesSharedPreview() method. You can override this method to add your own tabs by calling super.initTabs() and then addTab() methods or selectively add needed tabs with your own implementation.
        Overrides:
        initTabs in class TabbedLanguageCodeStylePanel
        Parameters:
        settings - Code style settings to be used with initialized panels.
        See Also:
        LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, TabbedLanguageCodeStylePanel.addIndentOptionsTab(CodeStyleSettings), TabbedLanguageCodeStylePanel.addSpacesTab(CodeStyleSettings), TabbedLanguageCodeStylePanel.addBlankLinesTab(CodeStyleSettings), TabbedLanguageCodeStylePanel.addWrappingAndBracesTab(CodeStyleSettings)
